memberdef.name: BOILERPLATE
memberdef.initializer: constexpr auto NAME() const noexcept \ { \ return state().template as<StoryboardElementState>() == StoryboardElementState::STATE; \ } \ static_assert(true, "")

memberdef.name: DEFINE_PERFECT_FORWARD
memberdef.initializer: template <typename... Ts> \ constexpr decltype(auto) IDENTIFIER(Ts &&... xs) CONST \ { \ return static_cast<CONST T &>(*this).IDENTIFIER(std::forward<decltype(xs)>(xs)...); \ } \ static_assert(true, "")
